## Description {#details}

### SwitchInst() {#af9344efa85aaf15e7e89c768bac6a69b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SwitchInst::SwitchInst (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Value, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Default, unsigned NumCases, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertposition">InsertPosition</a> InsertBefore)</>}>
Create a new switch instruction, specifying a value to switch on and a default destination.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst">SwitchInst</a> ctor - Create a new switch instruction, specifying a value to switch on and a default destination.

The number of additional cases can be specified here to make memory allocation more efficient. This constructor can also auto-insert before another instruction.

The number of additional cases can be specified here to make memory allocation more efficient. This constructor can also autoinsert before another instruction.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l03169">3169</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l03989">3989</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Add an entry to the switch instruction.

addCase - Add an entry to the switch instruction...

Note: This action invalidates <a href="#a219f2a3514d904d05dc8003a4ee5d291">case&#95;end()</a>. Old <a href="#a219f2a3514d904d05dc8003a4ee5d291">case&#95;end()</a> iterator will point to the added case.

### case&#95;default() {#a96a201f56500af4dd70b4169f140cb4c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CaseIt llvm::SwitchInst::case&#95;default ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns an iterator that points to the default case.

Note: this iterator allows to resolve successor only. Attempt to resolve case value causes an assertion. Also note, that increment and decrement also causes an assertion and makes iterator invalid.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l03410">3410</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

### removeCase() {#aff8bc09200ccc3617a5cb37e0d2f23ff}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SwitchInst::CaseIt SwitchInst::removeCase (<a href="#a723af715edeaedc8ed1048f8c235ce9e">CaseIt</a> I)</>}>
This method removes the specified case and its successor from the switch instruction.

removeCase - This method removes the specified case and its successor from the switch instruction.

Note that this operation may reorder the remaining cases at index idx and above. Note: This action invalidates iterators for all cases following the one removed, including the <a href="#a219f2a3514d904d05dc8003a4ee5d291">case&#95;end()</a> iterator. It returns an iterator for the next case.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l03469">3469</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l04026">4026</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
